product_name: Flow Talon Boa Focus Snowboard Boots - 2013/2014
long_description: The stiff-flexing Flow Talon Focus snowboard boots are built to handle any feature on the mountain. Boa(R) Focus lacing lets you quickly dial in the fit for amazing control. H3 Boa Focus lacing features two fit zones that tighten independently; it concentrates closure on the instep and holds your heel securely no matter how tight you crank uppers. Waterproof construction keeps your feet dry whether you're hiking fo freshies or enjoying an all-day shred session during an intense snowstorm. Custom-moldable liners feature EVA reinforcements for support, vented tongues for increase comfort, and flex zones in the forefoot for an improved fit. Self-molding insoles feature deep heel cups and arch supports for extended comfort. Internal lacing harness locks in the liners, keeping your heels down for amazing control when ripping turns. Vibram rubber outsoles harness the force of momentum to transfer power to your board; outsoles support your feet and damp vibrations without reducing board feel.
